turkish_example_sentence: Biz şehirde ucuz daire bulamamışsak, köye taşınmak zorunda kalırdık.
english_example_sentence: If we had not found the cheap apartment in the city, we would have had to move to the village.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы не нашли дешевую квартиру в городе, нам пришлось бы переехать в деревню.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz şehirde ucuz daire ______, köye taşınmak zorunda kalırdık.
